attributes.review:
Downloaded this app to support my main man Trump! KAG2020!!!! 

I have to say I’m very disappointed. Anytime I tried to do anything with the app it would error out with this code FAKE666NEWS. I’ve contacted support about this issue. Hopefully they get back to me soon. I only have an iPhone and no money because I never received my pandemic unemployment. I’m not sure how I can keep supporting Trump if he puts out such wantonly glitchy products. I’d really like to speak to a manager about these issues.

-Karen Chester Dumps
attributes.title: Very glitchy.
